configuration.name: accountId
configuration.title: Account ID
configuration.description: Account ID to be associated with the query.

configuration.name: areaChart
configuration.title: Line or Area Chart
configuration.description: Default is Line Chart. Enable for Area Chart.

configuration.name: threeQueries
configuration.title: Two or Three Queries
configuration.description: Default is 2 Queries (732 buckets). Enable for Three Queries (1098 buckets).
